Questions.Statement: Who is the main Japanese martial artist often considered the series’ protagonist?
What is Ryu’s signature special move called?
Which character is a U.S. Air Force major with a flat-top haircut?
What is the name of the evil organization led by M. Bison?
Which fighter is known for her fast kicks and wears a blue qipao?
In most games, how do you win a round?
Answers: By depliting the opponents health bar
